channel.title: How to set the cords for FunZone? :O I know thats stupid :D
channel.description: Hey, so im having a problem, im making a small funzone area in varrock and im trying to set the cordinates but im alwais failing,,, Could you tell me which way should i go like when 2 go south or north? I just dont get this ..

item.source: How to set the cords for FunZone? :O I know thats stupid :D

item.title: How to set the cords for FunZone? :O I know thats stupid :D
item.dc:creator: @lilwermscape_ftw lilwermscape_ftw
item.description:
@lilwermscape_ftw wrote:

imagine the place u want to make a funzone as a box. go to where u want the southwest corner of the box to be. Write down your x and y coordinates on a piece of paper as:
SW X = ####.
SW y = ####.
(just to keep you organised.)

Go to where u want the Northeast corner to be.
(Do the same as above but instead write down:
NE x = ####
NE y = ####)

Now you have your SW and NE coordinates.

Now look at your code:

if ((absX >= SW x coord && absX <= NE x coord && absY >= SW y coord && absY <= NE y coord && IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1))

Just put in the coords as shown in my above code:
SW x coord = Southwest X coordiante
SW y coord = Southwest Y coordinate
NE x coord = Northeat X coordinate
NE y coord = North east Y coordinate

i dont know if ur a new coder or not and if what i just said means anything to you… but thats about as simple as i can put it.

i really hoped that this helped you out.

Read full topic
